metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5956 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The vrend_draw_vbo function in virglrenderer before 0.6.0 allows local guest OS users to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access and QEMU process crash) via vectors involving vertext_buffer_index.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer0 - 0.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0-2').
